HiveFi is an AI-powered DeFi automation system on Mantle
The swarm consists of 10 specialized AI agents working in coordination
Each agent has specific roles but can communicate with others through the Coordinator
All agents operate 24/7 to optimize DeFi operations and portfolio management
The system uses advanced AI to automate complex DeFi strategies
Mantle is a high-performance L2 blockchain with ZK-rollup technology
Mantle offers fast transactions and low fees
Native token STARK is used for transaction fees
Mantle uses Cairo for smart contracts
Mantle's ecosystem includes DeFi, NFTs, and Web3 applications

content.text: Mantle market analysis: Bullish momentum building, key support at $2200 holding strong. Volume profile indicates accumulation phase, ZK-rollup metrics showing increased adoption. Technical indicators suggest upward trend continuation.

Analysis complete: Ascending triangle forming on 4H timeframe, volume increasing with each test of resistance. RSI showing hidden bullish divergence. ZK-rollup metrics support bullish case with growing TVL and user adoption.
